result.execSummary:
The defendant SHAWN P THOMSEN was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

- Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. SHAWN P THOMSEN

records.addlTxt: Outstanding balance has been sent to State Debt Collection.
SDCNI mailed to defendant on August 9, 2022, has been returned by USPS. Return to Sender. Not Deliverable as Addressed. Unable to Forward.
Defendant's copy of JOC filed 4/8/22 has been returned marked not deliverable as addressed, unable to forward.

ADDRESS INFO for SHAWN P THOMSEN
Current: 2891 Morrow Road, Omro, WI 54963 United States  (Effective: 04-07-2022)
Prior: 312 E Harrison St, Appleton, WI 54915 United States

9:14 AM Defendant SHAWN P THOMSEN in court. Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court notes an agreement has been reached. ADA recites offer -  in exchange for plea, amend count 1 to misdemeanor possession of THC 961.41(3g)(e), fine plus costs and will dismiss and read-in count 2. Def will accept offer. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to counsel. Defendant waives right to counsel. Court accepts waiver. Def pleads GUILTY to the amended charge.

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights. Court goes over the elements of each offense. Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty. Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY. Court finds the plea is made knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently. Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea. Court finds the defendant guilty on amended count 1 and will dismiss and read in count 2. Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today. Sentencing statement by ADA McElroy. No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

-$250 fine and costs. Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or call the Clerk of Courts Office (920-294-4142) to set-up a payment plan. 
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample. 


Court adjourned at 9:19 AM.

Prior: 13 Fox Paw Lane, Saluda, NC 28773 United States
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

10:31 AM Defendant SHAWN P THOMSEN in court.  Attorney Michael Kapelis in court. Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Kapelis confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading and requests preliminary hearing. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. ADA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500 signature bond and conditions of: Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for Status of Prelim April 7, 2022 at 9:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 10:33 AM

NOT ON THE RECORD  

Defendant SHAWN P THOMSEN in court.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant would like to meet with the public defender before we proceed as he believes he qualifies and thought Atty Kapelis would be representing him. Court adjourns initial appearance for April 7, 2022 at 9:00 AM.
Adjourned initial appearance on April 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Initial appearance on April 5, 2022 at 09:30 am. (Mailed a copy of the complaint to NC address.)

Def called in reference to his missed court date this morning. Def stated he no longer lives in WI and updated his address to a NC address. Def's phone number was verified. Def stated he never received a summons or complaint as he is in the process of moving and no longer receives mail from his WI address. Def stated he'd be able to get to WI on April 5 for an initial appearance. Def was given a court date of April 5, 2022 at 9:30 AM. I informed the def I would mail him the notice of hearing and a copy of the complaint, however he may not receive it in time for the court date. Def stated he understood.

9:11 AM Defendant SHAWN P THOMSEN not in court.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court issues a warrant - stayed two weeks.
